SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Class OAuth2AuditService

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.internal.OAuth2AuditService
@Service @Transactional public class OAuth2AuditService extends Object
Service for OAuth2 audit logging and compliance tracking. Provides comprehensive audit trails for all OAuth2-related activities supporting GDPR compliance and forensic analysis.

This service creates detailed audit logs for: - OAuth2 authentication flows - Session management events - Security incidents and violations - User consent and data processing activities - Provider configuration changes
